org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.NFS.Control

Class Omnipad

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.NFS.Control.Omnipad

  • public class Omnipad
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    1.0 This class is used as a gamepad-like tool for the teleop, where the teleop uses methods in the omnipad to determine whether a certain action should be done
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Topik

      • getY

        public double getY(double speed,
                   double heading,
                   double ly,
                   double lx)
        Gives a Y value based on field centric values
        Parameters:
        speed - speed of robot dictated by controls
        heading - heading given by the imu
        ly - the value of left stick y
        lx - the value of left stick x
        Returns:
        the Y value to be used in field centric code
